channel.title: Need Help Adding TokHaar-Kal

item.title: Need Help Adding TokHaar-Kal
item.dc:creator: @doritos_own doritos own
item.description:
@doritos_own wrote:

[center][size=36pt]Well Title Explains it All…[/size][/center]
[center]

14njxuc.jpg1500×528
[/center]

[center][size=18pt]This is my code for the custom ints in itemdef.java[/size][/center]
[center][code] case 13359:
itemDef.modelid = 62697;
itemDef.name = “TokHaar-Kal”;
itemDef.modelZoom = 2086;
itemDef.modelRotationY = 533;
itemDef.modelRotationX = 333;
itemDef.modelOffset1 = -4;
itemDef.modelOffset2 = 0;
itemDef.anInt165 = 62575;
itemDef.anInt200 = 62582;
itemDef.groundActions = new String[5];
itemDef.groundActions[2] = “Take”;
itemDef.itemActions = new String[5];
itemDef.itemActions[1] = “Wear”;
itemDef.itemActions[4] = “Drop”;
break;

}[/code][/center]

[center][size=24pt]Additional Info[/size][/center]

[center]Link To Tutorial I Followed - http://www.ru nelocus.com/forums/showthread.php?47135-PI-How-to-add-Customs (Remove the space)[/center]

[center]Link To Models I Used - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537945.msg3934429.html#msg3934429[/center]

Read full topic
